author: struberg
msg: EXTCDI-17 add a way to veto Beans depending on a particular ProjectStage
This also adds an exclusion to the checkstyle plugin for a bit more complicated
classes which get wrongly reported by the jdk-1.4 checkstyle-plugin-2.2 (current is 2.5)
